cause.description:
Due to Purdue Pharmaceauticals misleading the public Many people are dying from OXYCONTIN addiction.
1. OXYCONTIN is a very addictive drug
2. Protect the public
3. Purdue Pharma is GUILTY as charged
cause.mission: Raise Awareness about OXYCONTIN Dangers Every Story speaks Chad's voice and his story ...of TORMENT and PAIN & SHAME...
cause.name: In Memory of Chad Gregory Gardiner
